title: Unit 2: My House - Possessive 's, There is/are, Prepositions

theory.brief: Sở hữu cách 's dùng để chỉ cái gì đó của ai: <ai đó>'s <cái gì>. Ví dụ: Hoa's father (cha của Hoa). Cấu trúc 'There is/are' dùng để nói về sự tồn tại: There is + a/an + N (số ít), There are + số lượng + N (số nhiều). Giới từ chỉ vị trí: in (trong), on (trên), next to (bên cạnh), behind (phía sau), in front of (phía trước), under (dưới), between (giữa).
examples: This is Nick's room. (Đây là phòng của Nick.)
There is a TV in the living room. (Có một cái TV trong phòng khách.)
There are two bedrooms in the house. (Có hai phòng ngủ trong nhà.)
The cat is under the table. (Con mèo ở dưới bàn.)
The lamp is next to the bed. (Cái đèn ở bên cạnh giường.)

exercises.question: This is _______ (Nick) room.
acceptedAnswers: Nick's
hints: Dùng sở hữu cách: thêm 's sau tên người

exercises.question: My _______ (grandmother) house is in Hanoi.
acceptedAnswers: grandmother's
hints: Sở hữu cách: grandmother's = của bà

exercises.question: Where is your _______ (sister) desk?
acceptedAnswers: sister's
hints: Thêm 's sau sister để chỉ cái gì đó của chị/em gái

exercises.question: This is my _______ (cousin) bag.
acceptedAnswers: cousin's

exercises.question: My _______ (dad) car is very big.
acceptedAnswers: dad's
father's
hints: Sở hữu cách: dad's hoặc father's

exercises.question: There _______ a TV in the living room.
acceptedAnswers: is
hints: Dùng 'is' với danh từ số ít 'a TV'

exercises.question: There _______ two bedrooms in my house.
acceptedAnswers: are
hints: Dùng 'are' với danh từ số nhiều 'two bedrooms'

exercises.question: There _______ a kitchen and a bathroom in the flat.
acceptedAnswers: is
hints: Dùng 'is' vì danh từ đầu tiên là số ít 'a kitchen'

exercises.question: There _______ four rooms in the house.
acceptedAnswers: are

exercises.question: There _______ a big window in my bedroom.
acceptedAnswers: is
hints: Dùng 'is' với 'a big window' - số ít

exercises.question: The cat is _______ the table.
acceptedAnswers: under

exercises.question: The lamp is _______ the bed.
acceptedAnswers: next to
beside

exercises.question: The TV is _______ the door.
acceptedAnswers: behind

exercises.question: The picture is _______ the wall.
acceptedAnswers: on

exercises.question: The dog is _______ the two chairs.
acceptedAnswers: between

exercises.question: The desk is _______ the window.
acceptedAnswers: in front of

exercises.question: How many rooms are there _______ your house?
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'in' với nhà, phòng (in your house, in the room)
hints: Giới từ chỉ vị trí trong không gian

exercises.question: This is _______ teacher's desk.
exercises.explanation: 'my' là tính từ sở hữu, đứng trước danh từ
hints: Cần tính từ sở hữu trước danh từ 'teacher'

exercises.question: There _______ a sofa in the living room.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'is' với danh từ số ít 'a sofa'
hints: Chú ý danh từ số ít hay số nhiều

exercises.question: The wardrobe is _______ to the bed.
exercises.explanation: 'next to' = bên cạnh
hints: Cụm từ 'next to' nghĩa là bên cạnh

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: Nick's room is very big.
Nick's room is very big
hints: Cấu trúc: Chủ ngữ + động từ to be + tính từ
exercises.correctSentence: Nick's room is very big.

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There are five rooms in my house.
There are five rooms in my house
hints: Cấu trúc: There are + số lượng + danh từ + in + địa điểm
exercises.correctSentence: There are five rooms in my house.

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: The cat is under the table.
The cat is under the table
hints: Cấu trúc: Chủ ngữ + is + giới từ + danh từ
exercises.correctSentence: The cat is under the table.

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: The lamp is next to the bed.
The lamp is next to the bed
exercises.correctSentence: The lamp is next to the bed.

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: My grandmother's house is in Nam Dinh.
My grandmother's house is in Nam Dinh
hints: Sở hữu cách: my grandmother's house
exercises.correctSentence: My grandmother's house is in Nam Dinh.

exercises.question: _______ bedroom is very big.
exercises.explanation: Sở hữu cách: Tom's = của Tom

exercises.question: There _______ a sofa and two chairs in the room.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'is' vì danh từ đầu tiên là 'a sofa' (số ít)
hints: Chia động từ theo danh từ đầu tiên

exercises.question: The books are _______ the shelf.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'on' với bề mặt kệ

exercises.question: My _______ computer is new.
exercises.explanation: Sở hữu cách: father's = của bố

exercises.question: There _______ any pictures on the wall.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'aren't' với danh từ số nhiều 'pictures'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: The bag is under the chair.
The bag is under the chair
hints: Chủ ngữ + is + giới từ + danh từ
exercises.correctSentence: The bag is under the chair.

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: My books are on the desk.
My books are on the desk
hints: Tính từ sở hữu + danh từ + động từ
exercises.correctSentence: My books are on the desk.

exercises.question: The clock is _______ the wall.
exercises.explanation: Đồng hồ treo trên tường dùng 'on'

exercises.question: _______ is a big garden in front of the house.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'There is' để nói về sự tồn tại

exercises.question: The dog is sleeping _______ the sofa.
exercises.explanation: Chó nằm trên ghế sofa dùng 'on'

exercises.question: This is my _______ (teacher) office.
acceptedAnswers: teacher's

exercises.question: The _______ (children) toys are in the box.
acceptedAnswers: children's
hints: children là danh từ số nhiều bất quy tắc

exercises.question: There _______ three bedrooms upstairs.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'are' với 'three bedrooms' - số nhiều

exercises.question: The mirror is _______ the bathroom.
exercises.explanation: Gương ở trong phòng tắm dùng 'in'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There are two cupboards in the kitchen.
There are two cupboards in the kitchen
hints: There are + số lượng + danh từ + in + địa điểm
exercises.correctSentence: There are two cupboards in the kitchen.

exercises.question: The chair is _______ the desk and the bed.
exercises.explanation: 'between' = ở giữa hai vật

exercises.question: _______ school is near my house.
exercises.explanation: Sở hữu cách: my friend's = của bạn tôi

exercises.question: The rug is _______ the floor.
acceptedAnswers: on

exercises.question: There _______ a big fridge in the kitchen.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'is' với danh từ số ít 'a big fridge'
hints: A big fridge là số ít

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: The wardrobe is next to the bed.
The wardrobe is next to the bed
exercises.correctSentence: The wardrobe is next to the bed.

exercises.question: The poster is _______ the door.
exercises.explanation: 'above' = ở phía trên (poster trên cửa)

exercises.question: _______ are many flowers in the garden.
exercises.explanation: 'There are' để nói về sự tồn tại của nhiều vật

exercises.question: My _______ (parents) bedroom is upstairs.
acceptedAnswers: parents'
hints: Parents đã có 's', chỉ cần thêm '

exercises.question: The toys are _______ the box.
exercises.explanation: Đồ chơi ở trong hộp dùng 'in'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There is a tree behind the house.
There is a tree behind the house
hints: There is + a/an + N + giới từ
exercises.correctSentence: There is a tree behind the house.

exercises.question: The vase is _______ the table.
exercises.explanation: Bình hoa ở trên bàn dùng 'on'

exercises.question: This is _______ new bike.
exercises.explanation: Sở hữu cách: Anna's = của Anna

exercises.question: There _______ six windows in my living room.
acceptedAnswers: are

exercises.question: The shoes are _______ the bed.
exercises.explanation: Giày ở dưới giường dùng 'under'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: The car is in front of the house.
The car is in front of the house
exercises.correctSentence: The car is in front of the house.

exercises.question: There _______ a bathroom downstairs.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'is' với 'a bathroom' - số ít

exercises.question: The curtains are _______ the window.
exercises.explanation: Rèm cửa ở trên cửa sổ dùng 'on'

exercises.question: My _______ (uncle) house has a swimming pool.
acceptedAnswers: uncle's

exercises.question: The fan is _______ the ceiling.
exercises.explanation: Quạt trên trần nhà dùng 'on'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There is a big bookshelf in my bedroom.
There is a big bookshelf in my bedroom
hints: There is + a + tính từ + danh từ
exercises.correctSentence: There is a big bookshelf in my bedroom.

exercises.question: The pillows are _______ the bed.
exercises.explanation: Gối ở trên giường dùng 'on'

exercises.question: _______ many photos on the shelf.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'There are' với 'many photos' - số nhiều

exercises.question: The garden is _______ the house.
acceptedAnswers: behind

exercises.question: My _______ laptop is on the desk.
exercises.explanation: Sở hữu cách: brother's = của anh/em trai

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There is a big table in the dining room.
There is a big table in the dining room
hints: There is + a + adj + N + in + place
exercises.correctSentence: There is a big table in the dining room.

exercises.question: The waste basket is _______ the desk.
exercises.explanation: Sọt rác ở bên cạnh bàn dùng 'next to'

exercises.question: There _______ a beautiful garden and a garage.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'is' vì danh từ đầu tiên là 'a garden' - số ít
hints: Chia theo danh từ đầu tiên

exercises.question: The paintings are _______ the walls.
acceptedAnswers: on

exercises.question: The remote control is _______ the TV and the vase.
exercises.explanation: 'between' = ở giữa hai vật

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There is a beautiful picture on the wall.
There is a beautiful picture on the wall
hints: There is + a + adj + N + on + place
exercises.correctSentence: There is a beautiful picture on the wall.

exercises.question: _______ cat is sleeping on the sofa.
exercises.explanation: Sở hữu cách: Linda's = của Linda

exercises.question: The window is _______ the door.
exercises.explanation: 'next to' = bên cạnh

exercises.question: There _______ four chairs around the table.
acceptedAnswers: are

exercises.question: The slippers are _______ the bed.
exercises.explanation: Dép ở dưới giường dùng 'under'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There is a big TV in my living room.
There is a big TV in my living room
hints: There is + a + adj + N + in + place
exercises.correctSentence: There is a big TV in my living room.

exercises.question: The calendar is _______ the wall.
exercises.explanation: Lịch treo trên tường dùng 'on'

exercises.question: _______ isn't a dishwasher in the kitchen.
exercises.explanation: 'There isn't' để nói không có cái gì đó

exercises.question: My _______ (neighbor) dog is very friendly.
acceptedAnswers: neighbor's
neighbour's

exercises.question: The keys are _______ the drawer.
exercises.explanation: Chìa khóa ở trong ngăn kéo dùng 'in'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There is a big clock on the wall.
There is a big clock on the wall
hints: There is + a + adj + N + on + place
exercises.correctSentence: There is a big clock on the wall.

exercises.question: The computer is _______ the desk.
exercises.explanation: Máy tính ở trên bàn dùng 'on'

exercises.question: There _______ many trees in the park.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'are' với 'many trees' - số nhiều

exercises.question: The staircase is _______ the hall.
acceptedAnswers: in
hints: Cầu thang ở trong hành lang

exercises.question: _______ pencils are in the pencil case.
exercises.explanation: Sở hữu cách: Sarah's = của Sarah

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There are two cars in the garage.
There are two cars in the garage
hints: There are + số lượng + N + in + place
exercises.correctSentence: There are two cars in the garage.

exercises.question: The towels are _______ the bathroom.
exercises.explanation: Khăn tắm ở trong phòng tắm dùng 'in'

exercises.question: The ball is _______ the chair and the table.
exercises.explanation: 'between' = ở giữa hai vật

exercises.question: There _______ a microwave in the kitchen.
acceptedAnswers: is

exercises.question: The flowers are _______ the vase.
exercises.explanation: Hoa ở trong bình dùng 'in'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There is some old furniture in the attic.
There is some old furniture in the attic
hints: There is + some + adj + N + in + place
exercises.correctSentence: There is some old furniture in the attic.

exercises.question: My _______ glasses are on the nightstand.
exercises.explanation: Sở hữu cách: grandfather's = của ông

exercises.question: The plant is _______ the corner.
exercises.explanation: Cây ở trong góc phòng dùng 'in'

exercises.question: There _______ seven days in a week.
acceptedAnswers: are

exercises.question: The magazines are _______ the coffee table.
exercises.explanation: Tạp chí ở trên bàn cà phê dùng 'on'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There is a big mirror in the bathroom.
There is a big mirror in the bathroom
hints: There is + a + adj + N + in + place
exercises.correctSentence: There is a big mirror in the bathroom.

exercises.question: The bicycle is _______ the garage.
exercises.explanation: Xe đạp ở trong gara dùng 'in'

exercises.question: _______ aren't any cookies in the jar.
exercises.explanation: 'There aren't' để nói không có (số nhiều)

exercises.question: The _______ (students) bags are in the classroom.
acceptedAnswers: students'
hints: Students đã có 's', chỉ cần thêm '

exercises.question: The blanket is _______ the bed.
exercises.explanation: Chăn ở trên giường dùng 'on'

exercises.instructions: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
acceptedAnswers: There is a beautiful balcony in my house.
There is a beautiful balcony in my house
hints: There is + a + adj + N + in + place
exercises.correctSentence: There is a beautiful balcony in my house.
